title: Mat Armett's Bolognese
ingredients: ['1 tbsp Olive oil', '1 Large Onion, chopped', '2 Cloves Garlic, chopped', '500g Minced Beef', '400g Tomatoes, chopped', '2 tbsp Tomato Puree', '1 small bottle Red Wine', '2 Beef stock cubes', '1/2 tsp Sugar', '1 tbsp Italian herbs', '1/4 tsp Paprika', '1/4 tsp Ground Black pepper']
